amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to issue, implement, or enforce the proposed regulation by the FAA entitled "Operation and Certification of Small Unmanned Aircraft Systems" without consideration of the use of small unmanned aircraft systems for agricultural operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to issue, implement, or enforce the proposed regulation by the FAA entitled "Operation and Certification of Small Unmanned Aircraft Systems" without consideration of the use of small unmanned aircraft systems for agricultural operations.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Newhouse amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
